text: How can I improve my focus?
Try the Pomodoro technique: 25 min focus then 5 min break
That sounds helpful! Any other tips?
Yes! Remove distractions and set specific goals before each session
What are the best productivity tools?
Task managers help organize work and focus timers track concentration time
How do I create an effective daily plan?
Start by listing your top 3 priorities and allocate focus time for each
What is the best way to stay motivated?
Track your progress and celebrate small wins along the way
